name: tenant_id
description: Unique identifier for the tenant making the request

name: http_method
description: HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.)

name: user_id
description: ID of the user making the request (if authenticated)

name: ip_address
description: IP address of the requesting client

name: user_agent
description: User agent string from the request

name: request_size_bytes
description: Size of the request payload in bytes

name: response_size_bytes
description: Size of the response payload in bytes

name: database_query_time_ms
description: Time spent on database queries in milliseconds

name: cache_hit
description: Whether the request was served from cache

name: error_message
description: Error message if the request failed

name: region
description: Geographic region where the request was processed
